alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:51PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Natrona County through 315 PM MDT... At 251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Evansville, or 8 miles northeast of Casper, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Natrona County, including the following locations... Edness K Wilkins State Park. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 176 and 179, and between mile markers 194 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
